sqlMap.statement:
select base_occ,base_score,caltype,des,element_score,elementkey,elementname,is_last,is_sum,riskcaltype,templatekey,treelaye,upelementkey,indickey,valnum,is_audit from t31_def_element t where t.templatekey=#templatekey# and t.upelementkey=#upelementkey#
#elementkeys[]#

select count(*) from t31_def_element t where t.templatekey=#templatekey# and t.upelementkey=#upelementkey#
#elementkeys[]#

update T31_def_element set base_occ=#base_occ_d#,base_score=#base_score_d#,caltype=#caltype#,des=#des#,element_score=#element_score_d#,elementname=#elementname#,is_last=#is_last#,is_sum=#is_sum#,riskcaltype=#riskcaltype#,indickey=#indickey#,valnum=#valnum#,is_audit=#is_audit# where templatekey=#templatekey# and elementkey=#elementkey#
delete from t31_def_element t where t.elementkey in ($value$)
delete from t31_def_elementscore t where t.elementkey in ($value$)

DELETE FROM T31_DEF_ELEMENTSCORE s WHERE
s.ELEMENTKEY=#[]#
delete from t31_def_element t where t.templatekey=#templatekey# and t.upelementkey=#upelementkey#

select base_occ,base_score,caltype,des,element_score,elementkey,elementname,is_last,is_sum,riskcaltype,templatekey,treelaye,upelementkey,indickey,valnum,is_audit from t31_def_element t where t.templatekey=#templatekey#
t.elementkey=#upelementkey#
t.elementkey=#elementkey#

SELECT t.ELEMENTKEY AS id,t.UPELEMENTKEY AS parent_id, t.ELEMENTNAME AS NAME ,t.TREELAYE AS levels FROM T31_DEF_ELEMENT t
where t.templatekey=#templatekey#
select base_occ,base_score,caltype,des,element_score,elementkey,elementname, is_last,is_sum,riskcaltype,templatekey,treelaye,upelementkey from t31_def_element t where t.templatekey=#templatekey#
select treelaye from t31_def_element t where elementkey=#value#

select base_occ,base_score,caltype,des,element_score,elementkey,elementname,is_last,is_sum,riskcaltype,templatekey,treelaye,upelementkey,indickey,valnum from t31_def_element t where is_last='1' and caltype='2'
elementkey = #elementkey#
elementname like '%'||#elementname#||'%'

select count(*) from t31_def_element t where is_last='1' and caltype='2'
elementkey = #elementkey#
elementname like '%'||#elementname#||'%'

insert into T31_DEF_ELEMENT (TEMPLATEKEY, ELEMENTKEY, ELEMENTNAME, DES, TREELAYE, UPELEMENTKEY, BASE_OCC, IS_LAST, CALTYPE, BASE_SCORE, RISKCALTYPE, ELEMENT_SCORE, IS_SUM, INDICKEY, VALNUM,JS_TYPE) SELECT '$templatekey$' as templatekey, ELEMENTKEY || '$copy_key$' AS ELEMENTKEY, ELEMENTNAME, DES, TREELAYE, UPELEMENTKEY || '$copy_key$' as UPELEMENTKEY, BASE_OCC, IS_LAST, CALTYPE, BASE_SCORE, RISKCALTYPE, ELEMENT_SCORE, IS_SUM, INDICKEY, VALNUM,JS_TYPE FROM T31_DEF_ELEMENT t WHERE t.TEMPLATEKEY = #templatekey_temp#

insert into T31_DEF_ELEMENTSCORE (ELEMENTKEY, SCOREID, DES, MIN_SCORE, MAX_SCORE, SCORE ) SELECT t.ELEMENTKEY || '$copy_key$' as ELEMENTKEY, t.SCOREID || '$copy_key$' as SCOREID, t.DES, t.MIN_SCORE, t.MAX_SCORE, t.SCORE FROM T31_DEF_ELEMENTSCORE t,T31_DEF_ELEMENT e WHERE t.ELEMENTKEY=e.ELEMENTKEY and e.TEMPLATEKEY = #templatekey_temp#
INSERT INTO T31_DEF_ELEMENTSCORE( ELEMENTKEY, SCOREID, DES, MIN_SCORE, MAX_SCORE, SCORE ) VALUES( #elementkey#, #scoreid#, #des:VARCHAR#, #min_score_d:DOUBLE#, #max_score_d:DOUBLE#, #score_d#)
DELETE FROM T31_DEF_ELEMENTSCORE WHERE elementkey=#elementkey#
SELECT s.* FROM T31_DEF_ELEMENT t ,T31_DEF_ELEMENTSCORE s WHERE t.ELEMENTKEY=s.ELEMENTKEY AND t.TEMPLATEKEY=#templatekey# order by s.scoreid
update T31_def_element set js_type=#js_type# where templatekey=#templatekey# and elementkey=#upelementkey#
select js_type from T31_def_element where templatekey=#templatekey# and elementkey=#upelementkey#
update T31_def_element set elementname=#elementname# ,upelementkey='-1' where templatekey=#templatekey# and treelaye='0'
